Question1.1: end--You try to fight the guard. However, It doesnt turn out like the movies. Your vision instantly blanks out. Your consciousness ends. Youve just been taken out.
Question1.3: end--You were naive and forgot you were dealing with a merciless organization. Its too late now, and you see the guard point his rifle to your face without second thought, and everything goes black. Youve just been taken out.

Question1_2_0.1: end--You see a helicopter right in front of you trying to escape. Just as you start running towards it, you look to your left and right: Youve celebrated too early, as youre surrounded by a firing squad waiting for you. They instantly open fire and you look like a sponge the 5 seconds later. Looks like you were too predictable.

Question1_4_0.2: end--You try to be smart and pull out a remote threatening them that you can make the time machine explode. The guard however, notices that its the remote to an air conditioner. Not falling for your foolish plan, he takes you out with no hesitation.

Question1_2_2_0.1: end--You end up finding a helicopter amidst this chaos and try to escape with it. However, the helicopter explodes when you get in it and you meet your end.

Question1_2_2_2_0.2: end--You go down the wrong path and get caught in the explosion

Question1_2_2_2_1_0.2: end--In your attempt to break the time machine door open, you make too much noise, causing some guards to find you despite the frenzy. They immediately take you out.
